overview: The young wife dies instantly and absurdly in his arms. After death, it seems to him everywhere, leading him into the pool of death. To unwind, he goes to the dead of season at the sea-to the place where they first made love, succumbing to an instant flash of attraction. Dreams, memories and fantasies become his curse – he lives in the past. But one day his dreams and visions come true. A woman who looks like his wife will appear on the embankment, so that he will forever part with the image of his deceased wife.
title: Amethyst
